channel.title: XboxE3 on Roy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in XboxE3 on Roy Tang

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
I woke up and thought about watching the #XBoxE3 conf just to see how the other side lives…and it’s already more than 30 mins old lol

That State of Decay 2 trailer reminded me a lot of Sony’s Days Gone from the last E3 for some reason #XboxE3

Ooh DBZ FIghters!! #XboxE3

I enjoyed (and platinumed) Shadow of Mordor, but for some reason I’m not too stoked about the sequel #XboxE3

Nothing too exciting for me at the #xboxe3 conf, though the new dbz fighters game looks sweet. Sony tomorrow!

item.title: New note
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Ff15 on the xbox stage! #XboxE3

Customizable controllers is pretty sweet #XboxE3

Gwent! #XboxE3

It’s so weird that the highlight of Tekken 7 is Akuma lol #XboxE3

Woah, that was the actual Tekken 7 story mode! Namco putting SFV to shame! #XboxE3

Xbox Scorpio officially announced, your move Sony #XboxE3

Oh that was it for #XboxE3? Nothing too exciting or surprising then
